data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Gjirokastër, Albania know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gjirokastër, Albania
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Gjirokastër.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Gjirokastër, Albania.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, remind your church in Gjirokastër that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Gjirokastër, Albania a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Gjirokastër do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 19,900 citizens of Gjirokastër, Albania, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Gjirokastër, Albania.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.
